name: Spangler Group
overview:
At The Spangler Group, Mark Spangler has lead a multi-client investment office with a vision of “creating wealth” that has produced a consistent cycle of substantial growth for our members over the firm’s twenty-six year history. He directs the company’s private investment partnerships’ long-term investment strategies, while creating and supporting unique partnerships with the business community and entrepreneurs whose visionary ideas are driving innovations in the marketplace.

Nurturing an investment environment of excellence, ethics and innovation, The Spangler Group is driving outstanding investment performance for our family of investors in: fixed income ,private and marketable equities,hedge funds,real estate,commodities, including oil and gas, and timber.

funding_round.source_description: Action Engine raises $20M for media delivery to mobile phones.
